captions.text:
Empress Ki
Thorn love-4men

I’m dangerous 
My love is

The more and more you love me 
It could 
 get you hurt at the end

Don’t test me
Don't test my love

Can’t do it ever, can’t can’t
Can’t can’t

It’s dangerous, 
it’s for you

There is a secret 
in my love
Please don’t touch me

There is a reason 
in my silence
Don’t come near me

I love you 
I love you

Although
I can’t hug you

But I am dangerous 
My love is

The more and 
more you love me

It could get you 
hurt at the end

Don’t test me
Don't test my love

Can’t do it ever, can’t can’t
Can’t can’t

It’s dangerous, 
it’s for you

You will know when 
Time passes by

We don’t look good 
For each other

Sorry 
Sorry

I'm too risky 
for you

I’m dangerous 
My love is

The more and 
more you love me

It could get you 
hurt at the end

Don’t test me
Don't test my love

Can’t do it ever, can’t can’t
Can’t can’t

It’s dangerous, 
it’s for you

I love you but I can’t do it 
Can’t can’t

I leave because 
I can’t love you

I’m dangerous, 
too dangerous

These thrones hurts 
myself like crazily too
Don’t love me please

I can’t can’t can’t can’t can’t 
It’s dangerous, it’s for you

Empress Ki
Thorn love-4Men

comments.text:
+king inamo wang yoo existed but he was a bad king 
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chunghye_of_Goryeo u can read from here :) 
Lady Ki wasnt agood person either.For her part, Lady Ki-who had a special 
office devoted entirely to imposing taxes for her own personal use-become 
known for her corruption and lavish spending on palaces and luxury goods, 
becoming a much hated figure.[12] In Korea itself, Lady Ki's family, who 
all enjoyed influential positions thanks to her influence, were equally 
hated for their corruption as much as Lady Ki was in China.Emperor was 
toyish too like in drama lol so turns out none of them were good :D

comments.text:
[KPOP FAN AWARDS 2015]Extraite du Drama Historique “Empress Ki” avec la 
Belle Ha Ji Won, “Thorn Love” interprétée par 4Men est nominée dans la 
catégorie OST DRAMA aux KPOP FAN AWARDS 2015 !

C’est à vous de voter sur kpopfanawards.gong.fr
De nombreux cadeaux sont à gagner dont une tablette SAMSUNG et des 
abonnements à DRAMAPASSION et MY GONG !
Pour voir le clip : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fS0bxTivRJg﻿

comments.text:
I swear , this is the best drama I've ever seen in my life, I always hated 
Korean dramas but I thought I should try this one and I never regret a 
single second spent for this drama, 51 episodes is too damn little I wish 
there were 200 episodes, during the vacation I spent my last 2 weeks 
watching this until 3 or 4 am , it's very addicting and the love chemistry 
between the main characters is not just good but it goes beyond perfection, 
you get the feels every time . Like this if you ship wang yoo and sungyang 
or tal tal and sungyang <3 <3﻿

comments.author: Panda Republic

comments.text:
+Watchray Yin (I know i wrote waayyy too much but i would appreciate if you 
read the whole thing) Your welcome.You should definitely watch dong yi it 
has 61 episode's I know it sounds too much but when you watch it and 
understand how good it is,believe me you will want more thab 61 
episodes.And dong yi opened me to drama before dong yi I didn't even know 
what type was my favourite kind of movie or serie but after dong yi I cried 
sooooo god damned much my eyes were falling off and really believe I 
watched it so much that I even know what sentence they are going to say.And 
after dong yi I realised my favourite kind of movie or serie is drama and 
history.So it has a special place in my heart then I searched everywhere 
for a serie like dong yi abd there was this girl online she recommend 
empress ki and I was like ok I will give it a try.I didn't expect it to be 
THIS GOOD.I can say that empress ki is better than dong yi with drama and 
stuff but still in my heart dong yi is still one of the best.If it wasn't 
for dong yi I wouldn't know what type of movie or serie that I like the 
most and would not know about empress ki (which would be the worst thing 
ever since I love it SOOOOOOOO...much).All thanks to Dong yi.Will love it 
and remember it forever definitely watch it.I'm sorry it's soo long ;-)
comments.author: Katelin Young

recomending it to me !! it might be my next drama on my must watch list
